text:
Just wanted to throw this in here since some of you might bump into the same issue:

Code Action output properties are not always defined before the next action starts running, causing e.g. “Copy Property Value” actions to fail.
You can mitigate this by including a delay after the workflow action. This seems like an oversight, and something I would love for the workflow team to address.

Idea <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Prevent-quot-Copy-to-Property-Value-quot-actions-from-copying/idi-p/941193#M172920|here>.

Hi Magnus, I’m one of the developers in the group that creates/maintains this action. I don’t think this is the correct behavior that you’re seeing. The Custom Code Action should synchronously create those outputs to be used in later actions, even immediately after. Have you reached out to support yet? If we get a bug report we can look into your portal to investigate what’s going on.

In the meantime, if you want to DM me your account ID I’ll start digging around to see what may be going on
Nothing worked until we added the delay. Will send you information in DM. Thanks for the quick response.
that’s certainly strange so I would encourage you to open that support request. that will make sure the issue is routed to our teams
I’ll open a support request as well :+1:
Should Workflows have a “Hello world!” tutorial?
